
```{r}
exposure <- ct_exposure
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
exposure_summary <- exposure %>%
  group_by(year, disadvantaged) %>%
  summarise(avg_pm25 = mean(total_pm25, na.rm = TRUE))

ggplot(exposure_summary, aes(x = year, y = avg_pm25, color = disadvantaged)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Year-over-Year Average PM2.5 Exposure",
       x = "Year", y = "Average PM2.5",
       color = "Disadvantaged") +
  theme_minimal()
```
